Esta actividad la aprendió de manera empírica y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando su técnica y los conocimientos para manejar el negocio, cuenta con el apoyo de su hija y trabaja desde muy temprano en la mañana, cuando comienzan la producción para el día, luego sale a venderlas en las diferentes tiendas y a los vecinos del sector donde reside; de esta manera ha logrado generar los ingresos suficientes para solventar los gastos de su hogar y brindarle una educación a su hija. Alba es una mujer pujante, dedicada, apasionada por su labor y por sus familia, esto la motiva a solicitar el cuarto ciclo de crédito, con el fin de realizar una mejoras locativas (cambiar el piso y pintar las paredes), esto le permitirá mejorar la imagen del negocio y generar mayor confiabilidad en sus clientes con respecto a la forma como elabora los productos. Esto se verá reflejado en el incremento de sus ventas y de los ingresos que recibe. Alba sueña con fortalecer aún más su negocio, conseguir nuevos clientes y aumentar la producción, lo que le permitirá en un futuro cercano, gozar de mejores condiciones de vida y estabilizar sus finanzas para brindar a su hija la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria y tenga un mañana lleno de éxitos.
texts.en: Alba is 42 years old. She is the mother of one daughter and lives in a common-law marriage with her partner. Five years ago, she started her own business producing arepas [corn cakes]. This idea arose because of the difficult economic situation her family was experiencing some years ago. She learned this work in a practical way, and little by little she perfected her technique and her knowledge for running the business. She has her daughter's help with the business, and she starts working very early in the morning, when she begins the day's production. Later she goes out to sell the arepas to various stores and to neighbors in the area where she lives. In this way, she has been able to generate sufficient income to cover her household expenses and provide an education for her daughter. Alba is a strong, dedicated woman who is passionate about her work and her family. This is the motive for requesting her fourth loan cycle, with the aim of carrying out some improvements to the business (replacing the floor and painting the walls). This will permit her to improve the image of the business and generate greater confidence among her customers about the way she prepares her products. This will be reflected in increases in sales and in the income she receives. Alba dreams of strengthening her business even more, attracting new customers and increasing production. This will permit her, in the near future, to enjoy better living conditions and to stabilize her finances in order to give her daughter the opportunity to earn a university degree and have a future full of success.

loans.use: to improve her food production area (replace the floor, paint the walls).

loans.name: Duván Arley

texts.es: Duván a sus 22 años, es propietario de un bar, que montó hace algunos años con el apoyo de su familia, se encuentra ubicado en el primer piso de su vivienda y abre todos los días desde las 5:00 pm hasta la madrugada del día siguiente, esta actividad la alterna trabajando en una empresa y, cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres para el manejo del negocio en el tiempo que debe cumplir el turno laboral, allí ofrece una variedad de licores y realiza shows de música en vivo, pues su padre es músico. De esta manera ha logrado adquirir los recursos para velar por el bienestar de sus padres, pues la carga económica recae sobre él. Actualmente solicita el crédito para invertirlo en unas adecuaciones locativas para ampliar el establecimiento, así podrá atraer más clientela y aumentará sus ventas y los ingresos que resultan de ellas. Duván sueña con hacer crecer su negocio de tal manera que le garantice una estabilidad económica para poder estudiar mercadeo y ventas y así llevar su negocio a ser reconocido y sostenible en el tiempo, además mejorará la calidad de vida de sus padres.
texts.en: Duván is 22 years old. He is the owner of a bar that he opened some years ago with his family's help. It is located on the first floor of his house and it is open every day from 5:00 p.m. until the early morning hours of the next day. He alternates between this activity and working in a business. He has his parents' support to manage the business during the time he has to be working his shift. They offer a variety of liquors and he puts on live music shows, since his father is a musician. In this way, he has been able to acquire the resources to ensure his parents' well being, because the financial responsibility falls on him. Right now, he is asking for the loan to invest in doing some improvements on his locale to expand his establishment. This way, he will be able to attract more customers and increase his sales and the income that results from them. Duván is dreaming of making his business grow in such a way that it will guarantee financial stability in order to be able to study marketing and sales and thus make his business be recognized and sustainable over time, in addition to improving his parents' quality of life.

loans.use: to do improvements on his locale to expand his establishment.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Milagros is 48 years old and has one child who is in school.

Milagros has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Milagros requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

Milagros has been in this business for 25 years. In the future, Milagros would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Nady

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, five of whom are in school, Nady works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from farming sugarcane.  


Nady is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, soap, shampoo, etc. for her general store. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past from loans from NWTF and hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Raddad

texts.en:
Raddad is 19 years old. He lives with his parents and 13 siblings in a sector in Jordan called Karak. Raddad is in his 2nd year of studying for his Bachelor's of Physics degree. 

He is planning to open his own training center and to continue his studies to get a Master's degree in the future. As his parents are currently facing financial problems, he is asking for a loan to pay for his study fees.

loans.use: to pay for his semester

loans.name: Abdulqader

texts.en:
Abdulqader is 21 years old. He lives with his parents and six brothers in a sector of Jordan called Karak. He is a third year studying for a Bachelor of Remnants and Tourism degree. He is planning to work in his field of study after graduation to help his parents financially. 

Abdulqader's parents are facing financial problems which are not helping them in paying his study fees. For this reason, he applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his study fees

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Зебинисо 27 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Она более 5 лет занимается животноводством. Она хорошо знает все тонкости своего дела, так как до замужества помогала своим родителям по скотоводству. Данное время она успешно введет своё дело. Ее муж помогает ей по откармливанию скота. Она планирует провести мероприятия дома, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для проведения мероприятия. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Zebiniso is 27 years old. She is married and raising a child. She has worked with livestock breeding for more than five years. She knows the ins and outs of her business, as she helped her parents with livestock breeding before she got married. Currently she manages her business well. Her husband helps her feeding the livestock.

Zebiniso plans to arrange a party at home, but does not have the money. She requests a loan in the amount of 1,000 somoni in order to hold the party. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To arrange a party for her family

loans.name: Farida

texts.ru: Фарида добродушная девушка. Ей 19 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Она отлично училась в средней школе и после окончания средней школы она поступила в Финансово-экономический Университет. Она студентка 1 курса по специальности Финансы и кредит. Фарида является одной из успешных студентов. В свободное время она помогает родителям по выращиванию сельхоз культур. Фарида должна оплатить за учебный договор. С такой целью она обратилась за займом. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Farida is a good-natured young woman.  She is 19 years old.  She is not married and lives with her parents.  She was an excellent student in high school and after graduating, she enrolled into the University of Finance and Economics.  Currently, she is in her first year, specializing in Finance and Loans.  Farida is one of the best students.  In her free time, she helps her parents with cultivation of crops.  Farida is asking for a loan to pay for her tuition costs.  She is waiting for your kindness and is hoping for your generosity.

loans.use: To pay for the university education.

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en:
Analiza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell for her buy-and-sell charcoal business.

Analiza has been in this business for three years. Analiza earns additional income from direct selling beauty products.

Analiza has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so that she will be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling frozen products in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production for her frozen products sales business.

Teresita has been in this business for three years. Teresita earns additional income from raising pigs.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Nany

texts.en:
Nany is 51 years old and married with three children.

Nany works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. Nany requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell, like canned goods, eggs, spices, soap, coffee, and other goods.

Nany has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from livestock trading and pig fattening.

Nany aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell, like canned goods, eggs, spices, soap, and coffee

loans.name: Emelinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Emelinda works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Emelinda is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fishing materials for her fishing business.

Emelinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for her business

loans.name: Bella Rosa

texts.en:
Bella Rosa is 63 years old and married with three children.

Bella Rosa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell, such as canned goods, milk, egg, sugar, etc.

Bella Rosa has borrowed and paid 29 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Bella Rosa aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like canned goods, milk, eggs, sugar, etc

loans.name: Dodji

texts.fr:
Dodji a 37 ans. Il est marié et a 02 enfants. Rebobineur de profession, il habite dans le quartier Adidogomé et va 04 fois par semaine aux marchés de Bè et Gbadago pour les achats des pièces de rechange.

Il sollicite un crédit pour acheter 03 kg de fils émaillés, 03 kg de vernis et 03 rouleaux d’éteins pour mieux faire son travail et augmenter son chiffre d’affaire.
texts.en:
Dodji is 37 years old. He is married and has two children. He is a repairman by trade and lives in the Adidogomé district. Four times a week, he travels to the markets of Bè et Gbadago to buy spare parts.

He is seeking a loan to buy 3 kg of winding wires, 3 kg of varnish and three rolls of tin coils in order to better do his work and increase his sales volume.

loans.use: to buy 3 kg of winding wires, 3 kg of varnish and three rolls of tin coils.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 19 years old. He lives with his parents and three siblings in a sector in Jordan called Salt. His father is a governmental employee. 

Mohammad is in his second year studying towards his Bachelor's of Physics degree. He is planning to work in his study field after graduation. As his parents are facing financial problems at this time, he is asking for a loan to cover his study fees.

loans.use: to pay for his study fees

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.en:
Apolonia is 40 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Apolonia is borrowing 25,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Apolonia has been raising pigs for ten years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Alfie Rose

texts.en:
Alfie Rose is 29 years old and has three children. She is married and has one child who is in school.

Alfie Rose is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for seven years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Alfie Rose would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Yeison Deimar

texts.es: Yeison, a sus 19 años de edad se dedica a atender su negocio, un café bar ubicado a media cuadra del parque principal del municipio donde reside. Conoció la actividad desde los 16 años, cuando trabajaba en otros bares del sector. Su establecimiento es de mediano tamaño y tiene una capacidad para 30 personas, trabaja de Lunes a Sábados de 2:00 pm a 1:00 am, allí ofrece licores y diferentes cócteles y, sus clientes pueden disfrutar de un agradable espacio, escuchando música de todos los géneros.  El cliente es un joven emprendedor, activo, enérgico y entusiasta, siempre está buscando alternativas que le ayuden a progresar, esto lo motiva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para realizar unas adecuaciones en el local, cambiar las luces y el equipo de sonido y comprar surtido al por mayor, esto le permitirá dar una mejor imagen al negocio, que atraerá más clientes y se verá reflejado en el incremento de sus ventas; de esta forma podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de sus sueños, especialmente hacer crecer su negocio, posicionarlo en el mercado y generar oportunidades de empleo, esto le dará la capacidad de garantizar una estabilidad económica a mediano plazo para seguir aportando económicamente en su hogar, mejorar el nivel y disfrutar con su familia un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Yeison, 19, works tending to his business, a bar located a half block from the main park of the municipality where he lives.  He has been doing this work ever since he was 16 years old, when he was working for other bars in the neighborhood.  He has a medium-sized business that has a capacity of 30 people.  He works Monday through Saturday from 2pm until 1am, offering liquors and various cocktails.  His customers can enjoy his pleasant space, listening to all genres of music.  His customers are young and enterprising, active, energetic, and enthusiastic.  They are always seeking opportunities to make progress.  This has motivated him to seek support in the form of a loan that will allow him to make some improvements to his business premises: changing the lights and the sound equipment and stocking up with products purchased at wholesale.  This will enable him to provide a better image for his business, which will attract more customers and will be reflected in greater sales.  

With this loan, Yeison will be able to increase his income and continue to realize his dreams, especially his dream to grow his business, position it in the market, and generate employment opportunities.  This will give him the capacity to obtain economic stability in the medium run, so that he can continue to support his household financially, and so that he and his family can enjoy a better standard of living.

loans.use: to make some improvements to his bar: to change the lights and sound equipment and buy products at wholesale

loans.name: Antonio Esteban

texts.es: Antonio de 53 años de edad es una persona muy amable, responsable, y trabajadora, el se dedica a  la sastrería  desde hace 6 años  su taller de costura lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia  tiene mucha clientela por su buen trabajo y por los precios que son muy accesibles, con lo que gana de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos  que se le presentan en su hogar , vive en casa de un familiar con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 21, 13 y 9 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente., antonio está solicitando u crédito para la compra de lo materiales necesarios que utiliza en su taller como: hilos, agujas telas, botones, repuestos de maquinas, etc. y seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: Antonio is 53 years old and is a very friendly, responsible, and hardworking person who has worked his tailor shop for six years.  It’s located in his home and he has many customers because of his good work and good prices.  He uses the money that he earns to pay his household expenses and lives with his wife and three children, ages 21, 13, and 9 who currently attend school.  Antonio is asking for a loan so he can buy supplies for his shop such as: thread, needles, buttons, machine parts, etc., so he can continue his work.  This is his only source of income and he wants to provide a better quality of life for his family without limit.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Petzaleñas Group

texts.es:
La señora Ada Magaly de estado civil casada, tieene 27 años de edad, de escolaridad primaria completa, tiene 3 hijos que aun no estan estudiando, se dedica a la agricultura, inició este negocio hace algunos años comprando un terreno juntamente con su esposo y a la fecha lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para compra de fertilizante para cosecha de maíz, desea en el futuro contar con mas terrenos para poder cultivar no solo maíz sino también café, las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la siembra de maíz, café y a tejer cortes y guipiles típico.
texts.en:
Ada Magaly is 27 years old and married.  She has an elementary school education and has three children who currently do not attend school.  She is a farmer and began this business a few years ago, having bought her farmland with her husband.  She has 10 years’ experience.

She is part of a group and is asking for a loan so she can buy fertilizer for her corn crops.  She would like to have more farmland in the future so she can raise, not only corn, but also coffee.  The other members of the group raise corn, coffee, and knit sweaters and typical guipiles.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Noor

texts.en:
Noor is 24 years old. She lives with her parents and four siblings at a sector in Jordan called Mafraq. Noor is studying for a bachelor's degree in education/classroom teacher, 4th year. She is one step close to graduation and is planning to continue her studies to get the Masters degree. 

Her parents are currently facing a financial crisis that is not letting them be able to cover her study fees. For this reason, she is asking for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her 4th year university fees.

loans.name: Carlos Elias

texts.es: Don Carlos de 44 años de edad  vive en casa propia  con su esposa y  sus dos  hijas  las cuales estudian actualmente,   es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y responsable,   él  se dedica  al cultivo de maíz y frijol  desde hace 22 años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  Carlos  está solicitando un crédito para  poder realizar  lo que son las compras  de insumos agrícolas para el mejoramiento de sus productos  como herbicidas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y  de esa  manera  poder generar  mayor producción  y  poder incrementar sus ganancias así mantener lo que es una estabilidad económica y poder alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carlos is 44 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife and two children who attend school. He is a hardworking, honest, and responsible man who has been raising corn and beans for 22 years, and this has given him the necessary experience to sustain his crops.  He raises them in the land surrounding his area where he lives and is able to pay for his housing expenses with the money he earns.  Carlos is asking for a loan to buy farming supplies such as herbicides, compost, fungicides, etc. so he can maintain his crops, increase his production, increase his income, maintain the family’s financial stability, and provide a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Mauricio Alberto

texts.es: Don Mauricio  de 39 años de edad vive  en casa propia  con su esposa y sus 4 hijos  el cliente es agricultor de profesión  cultiva frijol y maíz y es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador  con lo cual con lo que gana trata de solventar los gastos de su hogar ya que desea que su familia tenga la mejor calidad de vida posible,   ahora el está solicitando un crédito para poder  realizar la compra de insumos agrícolas como herbicidas, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, etc. para producir de mejor calidad y en mayor cantidad para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mauricio is 39 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife and four children.  He is a farmer who raises beans and corn, and is a very responsible and hardworking man who uses the money he earns to try to pay the household expenses.  He wants his family to have the best life possible and is asking for a loan to buy farming supplies such as herbicides, fertilizers, compost, seeds, etc. so he can produce a better quality, in larger amounts, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Maria Anita

texts.es: Doña María de 64 años de edad vive  en casa propia  con su familia, ella se dedica al negocio de vender tortillas  desde hace varios años en su lugar de residencia,  es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable y además de ello es amable con sus clientes  lo que hace que tenga una buena clientela, doña Maria solicita un crédito  para poder invertirlo en materia prima para su  negocio de venta de tortillas comprando maíz por quintales y cal y mejorar los ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 64 years old and lives with her family in a home of her own.  She is a merchant and has been selling tortillas out of her home for several years.  She is a hardworking and very responsible person and this is why she has many customers.  Maria is asking for a loan so she can buy raw materials for her tortilla business, such as corn by the quintal and lime so she can increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: Doña  Maria de 63 años de edad  vive  en casa propia  con su compañero de vida,  ella posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa como lo son granos básicos, aceites, sopas, café, azúcar, refrescos, golosinas, huevos, leche en polvo, etc. doña Maria solicita un crédito  para la compra  de mas mercadería por mayor para tener más variedad de productos y atender mejor a sus clientes cuando le lleguen a comprar y es así como ella piensa generar más ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 63 years old and lives in home of her own with her life partner.  She has a store in her house and has many customers because of the variety of goods she sells, such as basic grains, cooking oil, soups, coffee, sugar, soft drinks, snacks, eggs, powdered milk, etc.  Maria is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise in quantity, so she can have a greater variety and better serve her customers when they arrive to shop.  This is how she plans to earn more so she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita is a 33-year-old married woman. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She has three children who are in school.

Cristita has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell. She has been in this business for 6 years. 

Cristita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 62 years old and married with seven children.

She earns a living by having a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. Lourdes is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Lourdes has been in pig fattening for 12 years and also earns additional income from a general store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Robelyn

texts.en:
Robelyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing/fish-vending business in the Philippines.

Robelyn requested a loan of 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fishing nets and other gear for her business.

She has been in this business for eight years now.

In the future, Robelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fishing nets and other gear for her business

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is 28 years old and married. She has three children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Jonalyn has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more snack foods to sell.

Jonalyn has been in this business for seven years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more snack foods to sell

loans.name: Sajeda

texts.en: Sajeda was born in 1994. She lives with her parents and two siblings in a sector of Jordan called Mafraq. Her sister is a government employee. Sajeda is studying for a bachelor of physics degree. She is planning to work in her study field after graduation and to open a physics lab in the future. Sajeda's parents are facing financial problems, which are not helping them in paying her study fees. For this reason, she is asking for this loan.

loans.use: to pay her college tuition for the semester

loans.name: Leda Argentina

texts.es:
Doña Leda tiene un grado de educación primario no culminado cursado hasta el segundo grado de primaria ya que sus padres no pudieron apoyarla para que ella pudiese completar sus estudios y es por ello que diariamente en compañía de su compañero de hogar trabajan muy duro diariamente para que sus hijos tengan mejores oportunidades en el futuro. Ella es agricultora se dedica a la siembra y cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijoles siendo sus clientes las bodegas, pulpería, vecinos y personas que llegan como intermediarios a la zona para la adquisición del producto al final de cada cosecha. Ella es madre de 3 hijos los cuales estudian en diferentes grados de educación en la primaria y al salir de sus actividades escolares ayudan a sus padres en algunas actividades del campo como limpieza y recolección del grano.

Ella ha solicitado un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de 40 libras de semilla de maíz certificada para su cultivo y 30 libras de semilla certificada de frijol, 15 QQ de fórmula 18-46-0 y 15 QQ de urea.  

Los planes a futuro son los de mejorar su vivienda ya que necesita algunas reparaciones básicas para hacerla más habitable y evitar la humedad, como también poder cultivar café ya que es atractivo y competitivo en el mercado de esa forma ella podrá generar más ingresos y cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Leda has a second grade education, since her parents were not able to pay for her to complete her education, so she and her partner work very hard each day so that their children will have better opportunities in the future.  She is a farmer and raises basic grains such as corn and beans, which she sells to stores, shops, neighbors, and intermediaries in the area who buy at the end of each harvest.  She is the mother of three children who attend school and help their parents with some field activities such as weeding and collecting the grain.

She is asking for a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative so she can buy 40 pounds of corn seeds for her crops, and 30 pounds of bean seeds, 15 QQ of 18-46-0 formula, and 15 QQ of urea.

Her plans for the future are to make improvements to her house, which needs some basic repairs to make it more habitable and prevent humidity.  She also wants to raise coffee because it’s attractive and competitive in the marketplace.  In this way she can generate more income and achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Abror

texts.ru: Аброр молодой и активный парень в возрасте 23 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребенка, дочку, которая совсем недавно родилась. После окончания школы Аброр не смог получить высшего образования из-за финансовых проблем в семье. Он стал самостоятельно развиваться в сфере технологии. Со своими друзьями Аброр учился у мастеров, которые ремонтируют мобильные телефоны и другую технику. И так он научился многому и набрал опыт в этом деле. Теперь Аброр самостоятельно ведёт такого рода бизнес. Этим он зарабатывает на жизнь и благополучие своей семьи. Аброр предприниматель, занимается оказанием услуг по ремонту мобильных телефонов. Для этого бизнеса у него имеется специальная точка, которая предназначена именно для ремонта мобильных телефонов в центре города, где он живёт. Жена  Аброра домохозяйка, она нигде не работает, а занимается воспитанием своего ребёнка, а также работает по дому. Так как этот вид услуги требует постоянного новшества, Аброр хочет купить новое оборудование для дальнейшего использования, это разнообразит и улучшит качество предоставления его услуг.  Поэтому Аброр  обратился в Арванд и желает получить кредит на покупку нового оборудования. Он надеется на финансовую поддержку и заранее благодарит Арванд за возможность улучшить и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Abror is a young and active 23-year old young man. He is married and has one child, a daughter who was born recently. After finishing school, Abror was not able to obtain a higher education because of financial problems in the family. He began to develop independently in the technology field. Arbor and his friends  learned from the masters who repair mobile phones and other equipment. Thus, he learned a lot and gained experience in this business. Now, Abror has his own business. This way, he makes a living and supports the well-being of his family. Abror is an entrepreneur who repairs mobile phones. He has a mobile phone repair storefront in the center of town. His wife is a homemaker and is not employed.  She is raising their child and does work around the house. Since his business requires constant innovation, Abror wants to buy new equipment for further use.  This equipment will allow him to diversify and improve the quality of his services. Therefore, Abror has turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan for the purchase of new equipment. He hopes for financial support and is grateful to Arvand for the opportunity to improve and expand his businesses.

loans.use: to buy equipment

loans.name: Sharif

texts.ru:
Шариф проживает в районе Хамадони, который находится рядом с границей Авганистана. Ему 54 года. Шариф женатый мужчина. Он живет с женой и детьми. У него пятеро детей. Его дети взрослые. Самому маленькому 18 лет. Шариф очень пунктуальный, он на протяжении 25 лет работает учителем иностранного языка в средней школе района. Жена Шарифа домохозяйка. Двое его сыновей находятся на заработках в Российской Федерации. Младший сын является студентом. 
Шариф берет кредит для закупа мелко - рогатого и крупнорогатого скота, чтобы начать новый бизнес. Так как жизнь с каждым днем все труднее и труднее, особенно большой семье. 
Шариф намерен совмещать работу учителя и скотоводство. В бизнесе ему будет помогать его младший сын. Он надеется на свой успех в этом деле. А также ждет от Вас помощи.
texts.en: Sharif lives in the Hamadoni region, which is located near the Afghan border. He 54 years old. Sharif is a married man. He lives with his wife and children. He has five children. His children are adults. The youngest is 18 years old. Sharif is very punctual.  For 25 years, he has worked as a foreign language teacher at a local high school. Sharif's wife is a homemaker. Two of his sons are working abroad in Russia. His youngest son is a student. Sharif has asked for a loan for to purchase livestock in order to start a new business. His daily life has become more and more difficult, especially with a large family to support.  Sharif intends to supplement his income from teaching with animal husbandry. His youngest son will help with the business. He hopes to succeed in the business. He also awaits your help.

loans.use: to purchase goats, cows and sheep to start a new business to supplement his income from teaching

loans.name: Ismoiljon

texts.ru:
Исмоилчону 34 года. Он из района Бохтар. Он живет со своей женой, тремя детьми и родителями. У Исмоилчона имеется трое сыновей - они еще ходят в садик. Его жена домохозяйка. Исмолчон счастлив в браке и в дальнейшем хочет иметь дочку. 
В данный момент Исмоилчон обеспечивает семью за счет животноводства. Прошло всего 9 месяцев как он начал данный бизнес. В его хозяйстве сейчас имеется только один бычок. Исмоилчон просит кредит, чтобы приобрести еще пару голов бычков и их корма, что послужило бы для развития его бизнеса. Исмоилчон просит 1500 долларов для осуществления цели.
texts.en: Ismoiljon is 34 years old. He is from the Bohtar area. He lives with his wife, their three children and his parents. Ismoiljon has three sons - they are still in kindergarten. His wife is a homemaker. Ismoiljon is happily married and would like to have a daughter in the future. Currently, Ismoiljon provides for his family by raising livestock. It's only been 9 months since he started this business. All he has at his farm right now is one bull. Ismoiljon has requested a loan in order to buy two heads of cattle and their feed, which would help him to develop of its business. Ismoiljon has asked for $1500 in order to meet his goal.

loans.use: to purchase two heads of cattle and their feed

loans.name: Aminjon

texts.ru:
Аминчон житель города Конибодом. Он родился в 1955 году. Аминчон женат. Он живет с семьей. У него двое сыновей. Жена Аминчона занимается домашним хозяйством. При доме у Аминчона 6 соток орошаемой земли. Сам Аминчон в свободное время работает таксистом, так как в городе транспортная система не очень сильно развита. 
Аминчон берет кредит с целью начать собственное дело. Уже много времени он в основном бездельничает. 
Аминчон на полученный кредит намерен купить одну дойную корову и быка, а также корм для скота. Таким образом он будет постепенно увеличивать поголовье скота и продавать их. В основном Аминчон будет заниматься откормом и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Он ждет от вас поддержки.
texts.en:
Aminjon lives in the town of Konibodom. He was born in 1955. Aminjon is married. He lives with his family. He has two sons. His wife is a homemaker. By his home, Aminjon has 6 acres of irrigated land. In his spare time, Aminjon works as a taxi driver, because the city transit system is not very well developed.
Aminjon has requested a loan in order to start his own business. He is underemployed. Aminjon intends to use the loan to buy a dairy cow and a bull, as well as livestock feed. Thus, he will gradually increase the number of cattle and sell them. Aminjon's business will entail fattening and selling cattle. He is waiting for your support.

loans.use: to start his own business

loans.name: Jabor

texts.ru:
Чабору 27 лет. Он живет со своей женой и детьми в городе Кулябе. У него трое дочерей и сын. Также с ними живут его отец, брат и невестка. Брат Чабора в данный момент находится на заработках в России. Деньги, которые переводит его брат являются единственным источником их дохода. 
Чабор хочет начать работать таксистом в автовокзале, на трассе Куляб-Душанбе. У него пятилетний водительский стаж работы. И еще огромное желание работать. Ему надо прокормить детей, а сейчас он безработный. К сожалению, его жена болеет, она находиться далеко от дома на лечение и Чабору приходится следить за детьми. Он хочет работать, но машины у него нет. Чабор просит кредит для покупки машины марки «Opel». Он верит, что мир не без добрых людей и ему обязательно протянут руку помощи. Чабор будет работать усердно. Он собирается перевозить пассажиров с 7:30 утра до 8:00 вечера. А за детьми в его отсутствии будут присматривать невестка и его отец.
texts.en: Jabor is 27 years old. He lives with his wife and children in Kulyab. He has three daughters and a son. His father, brother and sister in law also live with him. Jabor's brother is currently working in Russia. The money that his brother sends is their only source of income.  Jabor wants to start working as a taxi driver at the bus station on the Dushanbe-Kulyab route. He has a five years of experience as a driver. He has a great desire to work. He needs to feed his children, and he is currently unemployed. Unfortunately, his wife is ill, and is now receiving treatment far from home.  Therefore, Jabor has to look after the children. He wants to work, but does not have a car. Jabor has requested a loan to buy an "Opel" brand car. He believes that the world is not without kind people and who can lend a helping hand. Jabor will work hard. He is going to drive passengers from 7:30am to 8:00pm. His sister in law and father will look after the children in his absence.

loans.use: to purchase an "Opel" brand car in order to start working

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase grocery store supplies.

loans.name: Elsa Jackeline

texts.es: La cliente es de la ciudad de Machala.  Empezó cuando el papá de su bebé la abandonó y tuvo que trabajar para manternerlo, vendiendo ropa recorriendo varios sectores de la ciudad.  Trabaja con sus amistades y vecinos, vendiéndoles mercadería a crédito.  Está separada y tiene un niño que estudia en la escuela fiscal de su área.  Al momento necesita el préstamo para la compra de artículos de belleza para su venta.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Machala.  She started her business when the father of her baby abandoned them, so she had to work in order to support herself.  The borrower sells clothing by traveling to different parts of the city.  Her work involves selling to friends and neighbors.  She extends credit for the merchandise she offers.  

The borrower is separated and has a son who attends a state school in the area.  At the moment, she needs a loan in order to buy beauty products that she can sell.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Cecilia

texts.en:
Ma. Cecilia is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Cecilia is 38 years old and has three children who are in school.

Ma. Cecilia has a food vending business in the Philippines. Ma. Cecilia requested a PHP 22,000 loan from NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Ma. Cecilia has been in this business for four years. In the future, Ma. Cecilia would like to save enough money to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Engel

texts.en:
Engel works hard to support her family. Engel is married and has a buy and sell ready to wear business in the Philippines.

Engel requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like blouses, shorts, t-shirts, etc. to sell.

Engel has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, Engel would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shorts, t-shirts, etc. to sell

loans.name: Gerlia

texts.en:
Gerlia is 61 years old, widowed and has seven children. 

Gerlia is in the agricultural business doing pig fattening in the Philippines. Gerlia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Gerlia has been in this business for 10 years and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

Gerlia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ginaline

texts.en:
Ginaline is 28 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Ginaline is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase feed, vaccines and other supplies for her pigs.

Ginaline has been in this business for one year and earns additional income from handicrafts.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vaccines and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica works hard to support her family. She is married and has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Jessica requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her abaca weaving business.

Jessica has been in this business for 30 years now.

In the future, Jessica would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her abaca weaving business

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Remedios is 52 years old and has three children who are in school.

Remedios has a business raising pigs in the Philippines. Remedios requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Remedios has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Remedios would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more raw materials like abaca fiber, etc. for her business.

Marilyn has been in this business for 18 years. Marilyn earns more income from food vending.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more raw materials like abaca fiber for her business

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. Rowena is married and has a buy and sell firewood business in the Philippines.

Rowena requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more firewood to sell.

Rowena has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more firewood to sell

loans.name: Temotia

texts.en:
Temotia is 50 years old, married and has five children, three of whom attend school.

Temotia is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Temotia requested a loan of PHP 18000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Temotia has been in the pig fattening business for 15 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Temotia would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ikhlas

texts.en: Ikhlas is 19 years old. She lives with her parents and three siblings in a rented house. Her father is a government employee. Ikhlas is currently studying in her second year for a Bachelor of Plants Production. She is planning to continue her study to get her Masters degree. Her parents are currently facing financial problems which are not helping them in covering her study fees. For that reason, she applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her study fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Nedaa

texts.en: Nedaa is 23 years old. She lives with her parents and seven siblings. Her father is a government employee, which is a weak source of income. Nedaa is in her second year studying for a Masters of Accounting. She is planning to continue her study to get a PhD. As Nedaa's parents are not able to cover her study fees, she is asking for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her study fees

loans.name: Haya

texts.en: Haya is 23 years old. She is married and has no children. Her husband works as a police officer. Haya is studying a Bachelor of Arabic Language and Literature 4th year. She is one step closer to graduation. Haya is planning to work as an Arabic teacher in the future. Now she is asking for a loan to pay her study fees as her husband's income is not sufficient to pay for them.

loans.use: To pay for her study fees

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en: Asmaa was born in 1969. She is married and has four children. Her husband currently works as a bus driver. One of her sons is studying a Bachelor of Accounting 4th year. He is one step closer to graduation. Asmaa and her husband are currently facing financial problems which are not allowing them to pay their son's study fees. For that reason, they are asking for this loan. Asmaa is a conservative woman, so she asked her son to appear in the picture instead of her.

loans.use: to help her son pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Islam

texts.en: Islam is 22 years old. She is married and has no children. Her husband is in the military. Islam is studying in her third year for a Bachelor of Managerial Information Systems. She is planning to continue her study to get a Masters degree in the future. Islam's husband is not able to pay for her study fees because of his weak source of income. For that reason, she is asking for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Editha works hard to support her family. She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from rice retailing.  Editha is borrowing PHP 9000 through NWTF in order to buy additional vegetables to sell in her stall.

Editha has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 66 años vive en compañía de su esposo Andres con quien tiene 8 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos en su casa propia. Ella vive en compañía de sus hijos, pues tiene una casa muy amplia donde cada uno vive independientemente y así no se siente sola con su esposo. Su actividad principal es su tienda de comestibles el cual abrió hace 21 años, en todo este tiempo lo surtió muy bien tanto así que cuenta con clientes fijos. También cuenta con 4 vacas, un toro, gallinas y cuyes, los cuales vende o consume de acuerdo a su necesidad. Como nunca descansa por temporadas siembra maíz y cebada, pero la alfalfa lo siembra constantemente para el alimento de sus animales. Estas siembras lo venden a un comerciante mayorista que la visita muy seguido ya que conoce de la calidad de sus tierras. Ahora desea mejorar su tienda de comestibles, pues sabe que no tendrá la misma fuerza cuando envejezca más y solo tendrá que dedicarse a su negocio para subsistir. Este es su quinto crédito con kiva por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. María; invertirá los S/.700 soles en la compra de productos comestibles como arroz, azúcar, leche, entre otros.
texts.en:
María is a 66-year old woman who lives with her husband, Andrés, and two of their eight children. Given that they have a big house, her two children can live at home with independence and she is not alone with her husband. She has worked at her grocery store for 21 years and, thanks to her good management, she now counts with regular clients. She also has four cows, a bull, hens and guinea pigs, which she sells or uses based on her needs. She grows corn and barley seasonally and alfalfa all year round, as this is the food for her animals. She sells the product to a wholesale retailer who visits her often knowing the quality of her land. 

She is now looking to improve her grocery store. She knows that she will not be as strong in a few years and that she will have to work full time at the store. This is her fifth loan with Kiva and feels grateful for the support she has received. She commits to fulfilling her payment obligations as scheduled. María will invest the 700 soles in the purchase of food products, such as rice, sugar and milk, among others.

loans.use: to buy food products, such as rice, sugar and milk, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Margie works hard to support her family.

She has a vehicle repair business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Margie is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her vehicle repair business.

Margie has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her shop.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia, de 41 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Ella es una mujer admirable, pues hace poco se separó de su esposo, teniendo que afrontar la educación y crianza de sus hijos. Para ello trabaja sin descanso en el mercado de la ciudad, donde vende carne de gallina, trozada, por kilos y empanadas. Ya tiene 5 años dedicándose a esto; es muy conocida por sus clientes, que saben de la calidad de carne que vende. Ya por las tardes, abra las puertas de su tienda de comestibles, que abrió hace un año, ahí vende carnes, menestras, leche y demás productos. Paralelo a esto y como buena mujer del campo también cría vacas, cerdos, cuyes, gallinas y pavos que comercializa cuando los engorda. Pero como su lema es el trabajo constante, invierte sus tierras con una socia, para la elaboración de ladrillos. Ella pone la tierra y su socia la arcilla y leña para quemar los ladrillos. Al mes obtiene buenas ganancias, que le sirven para mantener los gastos del hogar y de sus hijos. Este es su quinto crédito con kiva por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Silvia; invertirá los S/.1700 en la compra de carne de gallina  al por mayor para su negocio.
texts.en:
Silvia is 41 years old and she is a simple woman who lives with her two children in her own home.  She is an admirable woman who recently separated from her husband and had to take on the responsibility of raising and educating her children.  She works without rest in the city market where she sells chicken parts by the kilo and empanadas.  She has been doing this for five years and she is very well known because her customers know that she sells quality meat.  In the evenings she opens her food store that she started last year.  There she sells meats, vegetable stew, milk and other products.

Along with this, and as a good country woman, she also raises cows, pigs, Guinea pigs, chickens, and turkeys for sale.  But since her motto is constant work, she works her land with a partner, in order to make bricks.  She has good earnings each month, which she uses to pay the household expenses and those of her children.  This will be her fifth Kiva loan and she is grateful for your support, with which she will be able to complete her goals.  She promises to make her payments on time.

Silvia will use the S/ 1,700 from this loan to buy chicken meat in quantity for her business.

loans.use: to buy chicken.

loans.name: Sabouggnouma Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe    SABOUGGNOUMA est constitué de 5 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de32 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles élargies avec leurs maris, coépouses, frères et fils dans le village de  MERIDIELA. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 4éme prêt. Les 3 précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de riz
à l’image de SETOU qui est la la femme assise dans la photos . Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 150Kg de riz  avec les grossistes de Bamako. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
Sabouggnouma Group is made up of five married women who average 32 years of age and 3 children. They all live in extended traditional families with their husbands, co-spouses, brothers and sisters, in Méridèle, a village in Mali.

They got to know each other through bonds of community, friendship, and business. In order to bolster their financial capacity and do better business, they joined Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, from which they are seeking their fourth loan. The first three loans were repaid without problems.

This group of women sells rice, which is the case of Setou (the crouching woman in the photograph). She intends to use her loan to buy 150 kg of rice from wholesalers in Bamako.

She sells retail at the market and at her home, for cash and on credit, to a clientele comprising primarily women.

She intend to turn an average monthly profit of XOF 20'000 (ca US$ 40) to be reinvested in her business and used to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy 150 kg of rice

loans.name: Aiziz

texts.en:
Aziz is 29 years old, engaged and living with his entire family in the southern part of Kosovo. He works very hard in order to earn a living and at the moment he is working as technical supporter in a primary school. He always searches for new jobs that are well paid but reports they are very difficult to find. 

The house that he and his family live in needs some renovations completed, but the money that he generates from his job is not enough to do this. For this reason he is requesting a loan to renovate his house which will provide better living conditions for him and his future family. His goal is to find a a better paid job as he hopes to have more income in the future. He appreciates this help!

loans.use: To renovate his house which will provide better living conditions for his family

loans.name: Minpa

texts.en:
Minpa is 49 years old and married with five children.

Minpa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Minpa has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Minpa aspires to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is 59 years old and widowed with three children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Sonia has a personal product retail business in the Philippines. Sonia requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more personal products to sell. Sonia has been in this business for one year. In the future, Sonia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more personal products to sell.

loans.name: Alban

texts.en:
Alban is 24 and single, living with his entire family in the southern part of Kosovo. Alban is the main source of income for his family. He works in a private company, but he receives a very low salary and it is not enough to support his family. 
He would like to save the money for renovating their house but it has not been possible, so now for the first time, he is requesting a loan to do some work to the walls of his home. Without the help of this loan, he would not be able to do the work and he believes that the loan will help him to improve his family's living conditions. His goal is to find a better job as he hopes to have more income in the future. He appreciates this help!

loans.use: To repair the walls of his home

loans.name: Shatar

texts.en:
Shatar, 48 years old, lives with her husband and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a house on a plot of land. The elder daughter works as a waitress at a pub, and the younger daughter graduated this year from university and is now looking for a job.

Shatar has been working as a cook at a restaurant for six years. Besides this, she also renders taxi service to local people using her own automobile.  Her automobile was emitting too much pollutant into the air, and the local authority restricted its usage. So, she is requesting a loan of 5000000 MNT to purchase an electric car. 

The advantage of an electric car is that it contributes to cleaner air in cities because it produces no harmful pollution at the tailpipe, such as particulates (soot), volatile organic compounds, hydrocarbons, carbon monoxide, ozone, lead, and various oxides of nitrogen from the onboard source of power.

loans.use: to purchase an electric car.

loans.name: Florida Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLORIDA”  iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Adela, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gisela es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de tostados, venta de calzados, bordados de artesanía, hilado de lana de vicuña, venta de ropa, venta de mantas, transporte, macramé de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gisela es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; este negocio lo emprendió por enseñanza de sus amistades hace varios años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones en crédito y salud.
texts.en:
The Florida communal bank will start its third cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Adela communal center.  It is comprised of nine members and is led by a board of directors.  Gisela is the secretary.  The members’ businesses are varied.  Among them are selling 'tostados' [deep-fried tortillas], selling shoes, handcrafted embroidery, spinning vicuña wool, selling clothes, selling blankets, transportation, and macrame blankets.

The loan that they will take out will benefit microentrepreneurs where Gisela is a member.  She states that a year ago she joined Pro Mujer by invitation from a friend who is a member of the institution.

She currently has a business selling clothes.  She undertook this business by learning from her friends several years ago.

The loan that she will now take out is to increase capital (to buy clothes).  She will get the clothes at the fairs in the city of El Alto.  She will later sell them at her sales space.  This way of working allows her to generate resources, as much as possible, for her household.  She is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the trainings about loans and health.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es:
Saturnina, de 37 años, está casada y vive en compañía de sus 3 hermosos hijos en la casa de su suegra. Su coraje y esfuerzo lo refleja en su trabajo. Su actividad económica se centra en la agricultura y ganadería. Ya tiene 8 años de experiencia en este negocio y le gusta pasar tiempo en el campo, pues su casa se ubica en una zona rural, donde puede criar a sus ganados. Su trabajo consiste en la compra de los animales en su mayoría ganado vacuno, los cuales engorda por un periodo promedio de 4 meses, para después venderlos en la feria ganadera de la ciudad, donde obtiene buenas ganancias. “Me gusta mucho negociar, pues si no obtengo buenas propuestas postergo la venta del animal para otra ocasión mejor”, comenta muy alegre. Ahora desea mejorar su negocio e incursionar con más capital en la agricultura. Este es su tercer crédito con kiva por tanto agradece el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Saturnina, invertirá los S/.1500 en la compra de un toro pequeño, para mejorar su ganado.
texts.en:
37-year-old Saturnina is married and lives with her three beautiful children in her mother-in-law’s house. Her courage and effort is reflected in her work. She makes a living from farming and ranching. She already has eight years of experience in this business and she likes to spend time in the countryside where she can raise her livestock. Her house is located in a rural area. Her work consists of purchasing animals, mostly cattle, which she fattens up for an average of four months before selling them in the farmers’ fair in the city, where she can obtain good profits. “I really like to negotiate, so if I do not get good offers, I delay selling the animal until a better time”, she says happily. She now wishes to improve her business and put more capital into agriculture. This is her third loan with Kiva. She is grateful for the financial support she receives to get ahead. She is committed to making her repayments on time. 
Saturnina will invest the 1,500 PEN in purchasing a small bull in order to improve her cattle.

loans.use: to purchase a small bull.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es: Evelyn, de 29 años, vive en compañía de su esposo Pablo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Ella es una mujer trabajadora, ya que mientras su esposo trabaja en una empresa como chofer, trasportando diversos alimentos a todo el país. Ella se dedica a la crianza de cuyes, los cuales vende cada 3 meses según pedidos. Gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio logró obtener 200 ejemplares, los cuales aumenta con facilidad, pues los separa de acuerdo a parentesco, embarazo y edad, de esta manera obtiene mejor resultado en la crianza. Además tiene 4 toros pequeños, que espera criarlos para venderlos de la misma manera. Su secreto es sembrar alfalfa, de esa manera puede brindarle un buen alimento a sus animales. Asimismo, por las mañanas se dedica a la venta de carne en un puesto que alquila en el mercado central de la ciudad.  Ahora desea obtener una granja bien implementada, con la ayuda de su esposo quien obtiene buenas ganancias en su trabajo. Este es su quinto préstamo con kiva por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Evelyn; invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Evelyn is 29 years old and lives in her own house together with her husband Pablo and their two children. She is a hard-working woman: while her husband works at a company as a driver, transporting various foodstuffs to the whole country, she raises guinea pigs. She sells them every three months on order. 

Through effort and sacrifice she has managed to obtain 200 guinea pigs, which will easily multiply. She separates them according to relatedness, pregnancy, and age, which allows her to get better breeding results.

She also has four young bulls, which she hopes to raise in order to sell them in the same way. Her secret is growing alfalfa, which allows her to feed her animals well. Furthermore, in the mornings she sells meat at a stall that she rents in the city's central market. 

Now she wants to have a well-implemented farm, with the help of her husband, who makes a good profit at his job. This is her fifth loan with Kiva, so she is thankful for their help, with which she will be able to achieve her objectives. In turn, she commits to the punctual fulfillment of her monthly payments. Evelyn will invest the 1000 Peruvian soles (PEN) in the purchase of balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals

loans.name: El Sol De Cupiche Group

texts.es: El grupo “EL SOL DE CUPICHE” está conformada por 07 socios responsables y puntuales en sus cuotas. Aydee tiene 29 años es conviviente con 1 hijos educando. En el grupo cumple la función de presidenta. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños a pedido de sus clientes. Años atrás se dedicaba a la venta de ropa para adultos. Es de esta manera que ha podido apoyar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de más polos, y buzos para niños. Su mayor deseo es comprar un stand  en donde pueda vender su mercadería. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo  brindado. Aydee es la tercera del lado derecho viste casaca fucsia.
texts.en: The group “El Sol De Cupiche” is made up of seven responsible members who are punctual with their repayments. Aydee is 29 years old and lives with her child, who is at school. She is the president of the group. She currently makes a living by selling children’s clothing to order. Years ago she made a living by selling adults’ clothing. In this way she has been able to help her husband with the family expenses. She will invest the loan in purchasing more polo shirts and tracksuits for children. Her greatest wish is to buy a stand where she can sell her merchandise. The group is grateful to Kiva investors for the loan. Aydee is the third from the right, and she is wearing a fuchsia dress coat.

loans.use: to purchase polo shirts and tracksuits

loans.name: David  Armando

texts.es: David de 30 años de edad  vive en casa propia  con su  esposa,  sus dos hijos  y una hijastra,  él es una persona muy responsable, trabajador  y con muy buenas referencias  personales,  desde hace 7 años posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia en la cual ofrece a sus clientes  la mejor calidad de productos  posibles y la mejor variedad, es por ello que él ha solicitado un crédito para invertirlo en su tienda y poder comprar más productos como: granos básicos, leches, golosinas, sopas, huevos, refrescos, etc.  con lo que obtiene en su negocio logra solventar unas necesidades de su hogar, ahora el espera con esta nueva inversión dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: David, 30, lives with her wife, his two children and a stepdaughter in a house of their own. He is a responsible, hardworking person with good references. He has had a grocery store at home for seven years where he offers his customers the best possible quality and assortment of food products. This is why he has requested a loan to invest in his store and buy more products such as grains, dairy products, candies, soups, eggs and beverages. With the income from his store he manages to cover his family’s needs. With this new investment, he hopes to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy grains, dairy products, candies, soups, eggs, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos, ella es una persona que tiene buenas referencias personales  por parte de sus vecinos, muy carismática y trabajadora  esto hace que su clientela sea mayor es por ello  que es conocida en el lugar de residencia , su negocio es una ferretería  que tiene en su casa, ella ya tiene 12 años de poseer su negocio y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para llevarlo a cabo, ahora ella solicita un crédito para poder realizar la compra de mas mercadería como: clavos, tornillos, pintura, madera, cemento, etc. por mayor y poder hacer más grande la variedad de su negocio con esto logra solventar algunos de los gastos de su hogar, espera con esto  poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: The client lives in her own house with her partner and her two children. She has good personal references from her neighbours. She is very charismatic and hard-working, which means she has a greater clientele and is well-known in her residential area. Her business is a hardware store, which she has in her house. She has owned her business for twelve years and this has given her the necessary experience to carry it out. She is now requesting a loan in order to be able to purchase more merchandise wholesale, such as nails, screws, paint, wood, and cement, and in order to increase the variety in her business. She will be able to settle some of her household expenses. She hopes she will thereby be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy nails, screws, paint, wood, cement, and other things wholesale

loans.name: Mirla Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Mirla es originaria de la ciudad de Boaco, tiene 33 años de edad y madre soltera de un hijo. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica al negocio de pulpería desde hace 9 años. Empezó esta actividad junto al apoyo de su familia. Gracias al esfuerzo, desempeño y dedicación ha ido creciendo en su negocio. Comercializa sus productos en su casa. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Maíz, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, jabón, aceite y golosinas. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá surtir su negocio, obtener mayores ingresos  y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Su plan próximo es expandir su pulpería. Su meta futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en: Mirla is originally from the city of Boaco. She is 33 years old and is a single mother, with one son. She has made a living from her grocery store for nine years. She began this business with the support of her family. Thanks to her effort, abilities, and dedication, her business has continued to grow. She sells her products from her house. She is requesting the loan in order to buy corn, rice, beans, sugar, soap, oil, and sweets. She thinks the loan will be a lot of help since she will be able to stock her business, obtain greater revenue, and satisfy the requirements of her clientele. Her next plan is to expand her grocery store. Her future goal is to improve the infrastructure of her house.

loans.use: to purchase corn, rice, beans, sugar, soap, oil, and sweets

loans.name: Vilma Elena

texts.es: Doña Vilma de 35 años de edad vive en casa alquilada  con sus 5 hijos,  su esposo se  encuentra en los estados unidos, ella es una persona que se caracteriza por su responsabilidad y su entrega en sus labores, muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante con su familia, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 3 años su principal siembra es el maíz y maicillo, tiene muy buena clientela porque sus productos son de buena calidad y a buenos precios,  Vilma está solicitando  un crédito con el cual le permita  comprar lo que son insumos para los cultivos como fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, herbicidas, etc.  con esto ella piensa mejorar su calidad  de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Vilma is 35 years old. She lives in a rented house with her five children. Her husband is in the United States. She is a person who is characterised by her responsibility and her dedication to her work. She is very hard-working and is eager to help her family get ahead. She has made a living from agriculture for three years. Her main crops are corn and sorghum. She has a very good clientele because her produce is of a high quality and is offered at reasonable prices. Vilma is requesting a loan, which will allow her to purchase supplies for her crops, such as fertilizers, compost, seeds, and herbicides. She thinks she can improve her own quality of life as well as that of her family with the help of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, compost, seeds, herbicides, etc

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, de 38 años es una mujer responsable. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Es una mujer admirable, pues cuida de sus hijos, sola. Se ingenia para poder ganar dinero, ya que su único sustento es la crianza de cerdos y cuenta con 15 ejemplares que engorda y cuida con mucha dedicación , ya que vende su carne por pedidos y en ocasiones lo compran vivos, “todo depende del cliente”, afirma. Le va muy bien en este negocio, obtiene buenos ingresos que le permiten criar a sus hijos. Pero para llevar un ingreso extra al hogar también trabaja en diferentes sembríos por temporadas de cosecha como también en las ladrilleras de su localidad. Pues su objetivo es aprovechar la temporada para que le paguen mucho más. Ahora desea abrir un restaurante en su casa, ya que no existe una en su localidad y el comercio es intenso, por ello quiere aprovechar esa necesidad. Este es su quinto crédito con kiva por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Julia, invertirá los S/.2000 soles en la compra de comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en: Julia is 38 years old and is a very responsible woman.  She lives with her two children in a home of her own.  She is an admirable woman because she cares for her children by herself.  She is smart about earning money and her only source of income is raising pigs.  She has 15 that she fattens and cares for with great dedication and sells the meat on order and in some cases people buy them alive.  “It all depends on the customer,” she says.  Things are going well for her business and she earns money that allows her to care for her children, but she also works different crops during harvest season to bring an extra income into the home.  Her goal is to take advantage of the season so she can earn more money.  Now she wants to open a restaurant in her home, since there are none in her area and business is intense.  This will be her fifth loan through Kiva and she is grateful for your support.  She promises to make her payments on time and will use the S/ 2,000 to buy balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: to buy feed.

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es: Don José de 59 años de edad  vive en casa propia  él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente  al cultivo de frijol, maíz y maicillo desde hace 10 años, es una persona amble, carismática y sobre todo muy trabajador, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su familia, don José está solicitando un crédito con el cual tiene pensado realizar la compra de insumos  agrícolas herbicidas, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, controles de plagas, etc.  y poder  preparar la tierra, todo esto para aumentar sus ingresos y poder alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José, 59 years old, lives in a house of his own and is a farmer. He has been growing broad beans, sweetcorn, and sorghum for ten years. An amiable, charismatic and above all very hard-working person, he manages to pay for some of the household expenses with the income he derives from produce sales. José asks for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as herbicide, fertiliser, manure, seeds, insecticide, etc., so as to be able to work the land and increase his income, with the aim of achieving a higher standard of living.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras Group

texts.es: El grupo “MUJERES TRIUNFADORAS” está conformada por 10 socios quienes se dedican a diversas actividades del comercio minorista. Ricardo tiene 63 años de edad es viudo con un hijo educando en la universidad. Hace 13 años se dedica al alquiler de cabinas de internet. En sus tiempos libres se dedica a la construcción de vivienda. Años atrás se dedicaba a ser albañil oficial. Su mayor deseo es actualizar su negocio de internet. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de nuevos teclados, auriculares. Su mayor deseo es lograr que su hijo termine de estudiar. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Ricardo el es el primero del lado izquierdo viste chaleco rojo con negro y plomo.
texts.en:
The group "MUJERES TRIUNFADORAS" is made up of 10 members who are part of retail trade in various ways. Ricardo is 63 years old and a widower, with a son who is studying at university.
